alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops; West Jackson and West Grand Counties Above 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Avalanche Warning issued December 31 at 7:48AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE COLORADO AVALANCHE INFORMATION CENTER. * WHAT...Avalanche Warning * WHERE...CAIC Forecast Zones: Steamboat and Flat tops * WHEN...Beginning Friday December 31 at 8:00AM. Expires Saturday January 1 at 8:00AM. * IMPACTS...Very dangerous avalanche conditions exist in the mountains. Heavy snow and strong winds will result in natural avalanches. Human triggered avalanches are very likely on Friday. Avalanches can break wide and run further than you might expect. You can trigger avalanches from below or from a distance. * PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...Avoid travel on and under all steep slopes. Travel in avalanche terrain is not recommended. Consul www.colorado.gov/avalanche for detailed information. Cooperstein

area.areaDesc: Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops; West Jackson and West Grand Counties Above 9000 Feet
